If not, see http://www.gnu.org/licenses. //Help Dialog Kids Portal: Every list has a context menu, which you can reach by long pressing an item. Lists can be cleared with one click (Menu). You can sort lists by title or date. You can also search for entries in the lists.

Bookmark: as always - save your favorite websites for a faster access. You can also set a bookmark as startpage by clicking the star. You can also set an empty page as startpage (Menu -> Empty page).

readLater: here you can save websites if you want to read them anytime later, if they are not important enough to be a bookmark.

History: your browser history.

passStorage: here you can save (encrypted) login data from websites. If you want to delete entered login data on exit, you must enable \"clear cookies on exit\" in the settings. Toolbar: Swipe: to the left to open your bookmarks and to the right to open your readLater list. Swipe to top to close the app. This works everywhere.

Click (only in the browser): you can enter a search term (see below) or a url. By pressing \"enter\" or the magnifier icon, the website will load.

Long press(only in the browser): opens the tab preview (see below).

History (only in the browser): opens a list of the last visited websites. Long pressing reloads the website. Tab (preview): To open a tab simply click on the preview. If you long press on a preview your favorite will open in this tab. The opened tab is highlighted. Clicking the close button resets the tab. You can swipe left and right to switch the tabs. Menu: Save website: you can save the website to your bookmark, readLater or passStorage list or save a screenshot of the whole website.

Share website: you can share the screenshot of a website, share the link as text or copy the link to the clipboard.

Search on site: search for text on any website.

Open passStorage: open your login data list.

Open download directory: opens the download directory to show, share, rename or delete files.

Settings: In the settings you can configure the behavior of the app, some privacy and security settings. At the app start these settings will always be loaded. Search: You can set your preferred search engine.
